docker.dockerfile:
#*******************************************************************************
# Copyright (c) 2020 Eclipse Foundation and others.
# This program and the accompanying materials are made available
# under the terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0
# which is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v20.html,
# or the MIT License which is available at https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.
# SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR MIT
#*******************************************************************************
FROM docker.io/eclipsecbi/jiro-agent-basic:spec

# These environment variables will be used in the uid_entrypoint script from the parent image
ENV USER_NAME="jenkins"
ENV HOME="/home/jenkins"

VOLUME [ "/home/jenkins", ]
WORKDIR "/home/jenkins"
ENTRYPOINT [ "uid_entrypoint", "/usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent" ]

ADD "https://repo.jenkins-ci.org/public/org/jenkins-ci/main/remoting/3131.vf2b_b_798b_ce99/remoting-3131.vf2b_b_798b_ce99.jar" "/usr/share/jenkins/agent.jar" 
ADD "https://github.com/jenkinsci/docker-inbound-agent/raw/3131.vf2b_b_798b_ce99-5/jenkins-agent" "/usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent"

RUN sed -e 's/JAVA_OPTS/JAVA_OPTS \$JENKINS_REMOTING_JAVA_OPTS/g' /usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent > /usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent.sed \
    && mv /usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent.sed /usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent

RUN chmod 755 "$(dirname "/usr/share/jenkins/agent.jar")" \
  && chmod 644 "/usr/share/jenkins/agent.jar" \
  && chmod ug+rx "/usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent" \
  && chgrp 0 "/usr/local/bin/jenkins-agent"

USER 10001:0

RUN chmod 755 "$(dirname "/usr/share/jenkins/agent.jar")" \

master.dockerfile:
FROM docker.io/eclipsecbi/jiro-master:2.414.2

EXPOSE 8080
EXPOSE 50000

COPY jenkins/ref/plugins /usr/share/jenkins/ref/plugins

RUN mkdir -p /usr/share/jenkins/ref/userContent/theme/
COPY jenkins/quicksilver.css.override /usr/share/jenkins/ref/userContent/theme/
COPY jenkins/title.js /usr/share/jenkins/ref/userContent/theme/

USER 10001

jiroMaster.dockerfile:
#*******************************************************************************
# Copyright (c) 2020 Eclipse Foundation and others.
# This program and the accompanying materials are made available
# under the terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0
# which is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v20.html,
# or the MIT License which is available at https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.
# SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR MIT
#*******************************************************************************
FROM eclipsecbi/semeru-ubuntu-coreutils:openjdk11-jammy

# These environment variables will be used in the uid_entrypoint script from the parent image
ENV USER_NAME="jenkins"
ENV HOME="/var/jenkins"

# jenkins version being bundled in this docker image
ENV JENKINS_HOME="/var/jenkins"
ENV JENKINS_WAR="/usr/share/jenkins/jenkins.war"
ENV COPY_REFERENCE_FILE_LOG="/var/jenkins/copy_reference_file.log"
ENV REF="/usr/share/jenkins/ref"

VOLUME [ "/var/jenkins", "/var/cache/jenkins/war", "/var/cache/jenkins/plugins" ]
WORKDIR "/var/jenkins"

ENTRYPOINT ["uid_entrypoint", "/usr/bin/dumb-init", "--", "/usr/local/bin/jenkins.sh"]

RUN mkdir -p $(dirname "/usr/share/jenkins/jenkins.war") && mkdir -p "/usr/share/jenkins/ref"

COPY scripts/* /usr/local/bin/
RUN chmod ug+x /usr/local/bin/*

COPY war/jenkins.war "/usr/share/jenkins/jenkins.war"
COPY ref/ "/usr/share/jenkins/ref/"
